—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏.title: A breach every month raises doubts about South Korea‚Äôs digital defenses
—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏.description: Known for its blazing fast internet and home to some of the world‚Äôs biggest tech giants, South Korea has also faced a string of data breaches and cybersecurity lapses that has struggled to match the pace of its digital ambitions.

—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏.title: Newsom signs bill giving Uber and Lyft drivers in California the right to unionize
—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏.description: Drivers for ride-hailing apps like Uber and Lyft will soon have the right to unionize in California as independent contractors, thanks to a bill signed Friday by Governor Gavin Newsom.

—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏.title: If you‚Äôre not an AI startup, good luck raising money from VCs
—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏.description: New PitchBook data illustrates how dramatically AI is dominating startup investment, with 2025 on-track to become the first year when AI accounts for more than half of all VC money invested.

—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏.title: Startups and the U.S. government: It‚Äôs getting complicated
—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏.description: Equity co-hosts Anthony Ha, Kirsten Korosec, and Max Zeff explore the how startups are navigating a topsy-turvy relationship with the U.S. government.

—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏.title: Anker offered Eufy camera owners $2 per video for AI training
—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏.description: Hundreds of Eufy customers have donated hundreds of thousands of videos to train the company‚Äôs AI systems.

—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏.title: Instacrops will demo its water-saving, crop-boosting AI at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏.description: Agriculture consumes a vast amount of water, and some countries are under more stress than others. Instacrops pivoted to AI to help farmers cut water use by 30%.

—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏.title: Sam Altman says Sora will add ‚Äògranular,‚Äô opt-in copyright controls
—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–∏.description: OpenAI may be reversing course on how it approaches copyright and intellectual property in its new video app Sora.

–Ω–∞—É–∫–∞.title: Undergrad students deploy applications to geosynchronous satellite 22,236 miles above Earth
–Ω–∞—É–∫–∞.description: For many college students, satellites are faint dots crossing the sky on clear nights. These objects are background details from science fiction to reality, like GPS, satellite radio, and WiFi.

–Ω–∞—É–∫–∞.title: Australia's new food security strategy: What's on the table, and what's missing?
–Ω–∞—É–∫–∞.description: In 2023, a parliamentary inquiry into food security was held in Australia. This involves the government asking for public and expert advice on key issues to make better decisions.

–Ω–∞—É–∫–∞.title: Saturday Citations: Bird news: Vultures as curators and a newly discovered interspecies warning call
–Ω–∞—É–∫–∞.description: This week, researchers reported that mild dietary stress supports healthy aging. Engineers created artificial neurons that can communicate directly with living cells. And dark energy observations suggest that the universe could end in a "big crunch" at 33 billion years old.

–Ω–∞—É–∫–∞.title: Molecular coating cleans up noisy quantum light
–Ω–∞—É–∫–∞.description: Quantum technologies demand perfection: one photon at a time, every time, all with the same energy. Even tiny deviations in the number or energy of photons can derail devices, threatening the performance of quantum computers that someday could make up a quantum internet.

–Ω–∞—É–∫–∞.title: Computational tool helps forecast volcano slope collapses and tsunamis
–Ω–∞—É–∫–∞.description: For people living near volcanoes, danger goes well beyond lava flows and clouds of ash. Some explosive eruptions can lead to dramatic collapses of the sides of a volcano, like those at Mount St. Helens, Washington, and Anak Krakatau, Indonesia. The latter triggered tsunamis blamed for most deaths from its historic eruptions in 1883.

–Ω–∞—É–∫–∞.title: First wolf-dog hybrid confirmed in Greece
–Ω–∞—É–∫–∞.description: A prominent Greek wildlife group on Friday said it had confirmed the first case of a wolf-dog hybrid in the north of the country.

–Ω–∞—É–∫–∞.title: Accelerated Gulf of Maine warming may pose a serious threat to American lobsters
–Ω–∞—É–∫–∞.description: The Gulf of Maine is warming faster than 99% of the world's oceans, raising concerns for its $2 billion-a-year American lobster fishery. Scientists at William & Mary's Batten School & VIMS have been studying the impacts of ocean acidification and warming on lobster reproduction, and the results of their most recent research suggest the rising temperatures pose the greatest risk.

—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç.title: Miami dominance and a UCLA stunner: Recapping a chaotic Week 6
—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç.description: In Week 6, the Grim Reaper came for Penn State and Texas, but Miami proved itself against Florida State.

—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç.title: Projecting the CFP top 12 after Week 6: Canes clearly No. 1
—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç.description: We assess how the committee could stack the top teams in the country after Week 6.

—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç.title: Ex-QB Sanchez arrested, faces 3 possible charges
—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç.description: Former NFL quarterback and current Fox Sports broadcaster Mark Sanchez was arrested in Indianapolis on Saturday and is facing three misdemeanor charges in relation to an incident where he was stabbed and taken to a hospital.

—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç.title: With Skubal up next, Tigers notch 'huge' G1 win
—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç.description: After winning two of three in Cleveland during the wild-card round, the Detroit Tigers, who have spent the past two weeks on the road, took a 1-0 lead in the best-of-five American League Division Series on Saturday via a 3-2 win over the Seattle Mariners.

—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç.title: Pereira reclaims title in 80-second TKO of Ankalaev
—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç.description: Alex Pereira is the champion of the light heavyweights again after crushing Magomed Ankalaev in 80 seconds of Round 1 on Saturday at UFC 320.

—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç.title: Another Hernandez HR lifts Dodgers over Phillies
—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç.description: Teoscar Hernandez rallied the Los Angeles Dodgers with a three-run homer in the seventh inning that silenced the crowd and led his club to a 5-3 victory over the Philadelphia Phillies in Game 1 of their National League Division Series on Saturday night.

—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç.title: 'Embarrassing' loss at UCLA has Penn St. reeling
—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç.description: A week removed from its first loss of the season, a home defeat to Oregon, No. 7 Penn State dropped a 42-37 decision to previously winless UCLA at the Rose Bowl on Saturday, as the Bruins became the first 0-4 team to defeat a top-10 team since 1985.
